how_transparency: Model transparency is implied through evaluation criteria like clarity of documentation, interpretability, and practicality, beyond just accuracy.
name: Global Energy Forecasting Competition 2012 - Load Forecasting

how_transparency: Model transparency is implicitly discussed through the evaluative focus on clarity of documentation and interpretability of the models.
name: Global Energy Forecasting Competition 2012 - Wind Forecasting

how_data_privacy: Privacy concerns exist as some schools with small populations do not have their data reported to protect student privacy.
how_transparency: Transparency is addressed through providing intuitive letter grades and openly distributing methodology used for grading schools.
name: Visualize the State of Public Education in Colorado

how_data_privacy: The dataset is anonymized, but the use of social network data can still carry privacy risks if improperly accessed or de-anonymized.
how_transparency: Participants are encouraged to explain their approaches, indicating a focus on model explainability beyond just performance. AUC is the primary performance metric.
name: IJCNN Social Network Challenge
